column2: You use all of your ammunition to try and kill all the seagulls you see. You kill all the seagulls - terrifying the enemy and making him flee.
You choose to try to imitate Voltron with Dully by placing him on your shoulders - The enemy kills the two of you instantly.
You decide to divert your attention to Missile (your pet snail). The enemy kills you - but Missile gets away in the end.
You throw Dully at the enemy - both the enemy and Dully are killed instantly.
